doc.title: Kim's Joo Chiat: XO Hokkien Mee: A Tale of Passion and Tenacity
doc.text: This/DT is/VBZ one/CD for/IN the/DT oyster/NN lovers/NNS !/. Imagine/RB a/DT plate/NN of/IN hokkien/NN mee/NN topped/VBD with/IN a/DT rich/JJ seafood/NN sauce/NN made/VBD from/IN prawns/NNS ,/, sotong/NN and/CC oysters/NN ./. Ooh/DT .../: it/PRP has/VBZ gotta/UH be/VB shiok/NN ./.
